column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''26''' is the twenty-sixth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Uglúk to the Dung-pit" — analysis by [[Carl F. Hostetter]].
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''

* "Transitions in Translations (column) — [[Arden R. Smith]].<ref>Contents of the column: "Edition Shifting" in the Revised Dutch Hobbit; Polish Elvish; Attercop Pass; Russian Tolkien Update (by [[David Doughan]]).</ref>
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
